Posts.Content: I was put on Arimidex after my breast cancer as well.  After 2 weeks I had to stop taking it due to severe headaches and nausea.  If I took my arimidex later in the day I was fine unitl about 2 hours after I took it .  It took a lot of arguments and PROVING to my Dr but finally I got it changed and the symptoms  stopped.  Best wishes on your continued health aned God Bless.
Posts.Title: Problems Following Breast Cancer
